description: This file sets up a data analysis agent that uses OpenAI's GPT-4 model and DuckDB to analyze movie data from a CSV file. It creates a database table from a CSV URL, configures an agent with tools and context, and runs an asynchronous response to a query about movie ratings.

classes.name: DuckDbTools
classes.description: A utility class for interacting with DuckDB, including creating tables from CSV files.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that manages a language model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model configuration.

methods.name: create_table_from_path
methods.description: Creates a database table from a CSV file located at a specified path.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response from the agent to a given prompt.
